reviewText:
Everything Is Black and White is a game that takes a new spin on a common theme with extremely difficult puzzle platforming. The game is very simple from the beginning, and has very simple controls. Very quickly however, it turns up the heat with very challenging platforming, and reallly makes you stop and think about your next move. This game really gets you thinking about every single move you make, and very few games now a days do that. It also has a very quirky and awesome soundtrack.

If you are looking for a simple, yet challenging game for a great price look no further.

8/10  Overall
